welcome_message_body: Welcome to Berazategui, Argentina! Get ready to discover a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Berazategui has to offer.

restaurants.name: BUENOSAIRESUSHI
restaurants.description: BUENOSAIRESUSHI is a sushi restaurant located in Quilmes.
restaurants.address: N. Videla 363 (E/ Mitre y Sarmiento), 1878 Quilmes, Buenos Aires

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
